cause.description:
I have started this group to raise awareness at the amount of children who are in our Toronto Hospital for sick kids. Surprisingly, most of these children could be helped if the funds were available for their needs. "SickKids is one of the largest and most respected paediatric academic health science centres in the world. " (HFSC of T.O.) "Close to 100,000 children come to SickKids each year for world leading care." (HFSC of T.O.) "The Centre performs 80 per cent of all children’s heart transplants in Canada" (HFSC of T.O.)
http://www.sickkids.ca/
1. Help improve the lives of sick children worldwide
2. Help the medical experts to cover costs of expensive equipment
3. Help the expansion of research so that more children could be helped
cause.mission: Aid sick children to recover from their illnesses
cause.name: Toronto's Hospital for Sick Kids
